relation: There are a lot of options but no frat or sorority houses.
Hang out with friends, go to sporting events and head to St. Louis! Also, the Hettenhausen Center for the Arts always has amazing shows that are free to students.
It isn't the best but it will keep you full!
The traditional dorms are old but they are open and encourage a social environment.
It all depends on the course, course level and professor. Generally, it is tough but thought provoking.
Be open to new things and new people. It is a small school so be ready to know everyone on campus!

McKendree University is an amazing school. They have small class sizes, brilliant professors and a beautiful campus. If you want a personalized college experience, McK is the place for you, GO BEARCATS!!!
pageTitle: McKendree University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

Good choices with the amount in the Ames Dining Hall and 1828 cafe, but the chefs don't very often stray from the normal pick of the night. You do get a good amount of food for your money, though, even with the 10 meal plan., 2272=Campus is JUMPING! In Fall 2011, two brand new dorm buildings will open. New student groups are always being created and are coming up with new activities for commuter and resident students alike. I have made more friends here than I did even at my high school! McKendree is home to me, now.}

Login to rate or flag the reviews Matt from Belleville, IL 05/20/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 25 Categories Comments Great for these types of students McKendree encourages dedication to studies, but the school is a great place for any individual, with many activities such as movie nights and live entertainment. Tips for prospective students If you get 30 or above on the ACT, you will have better chances at getting a larger scholarship. Make sure you contact the school about it the fall or early spring before your planned first year so you don't miss the scholarship events. Bang for the buck A fairly expensive college for the area, but they do offer large scholarships for students with good grades. Also, it is consistently ranked in the top
